<!--
## How to use this template

1. Fill in the frontmatter below (between the `---` markers)
2. Write your post content below the frontmatter
3. Comment `/post` on this issue to trigger the post creation workflow

## Frontmatter fields

Required:
- `title`: Post title
- `category`: Post category path (e.g., `blog`, `blog/practicing`, `notes`)

Optional:
- `date`: Publish date (defaults to now). Format: "YYYY-MM-DD" or "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS"
- `tags`: Comma-separated or YAML array. Auto-suggested if empty.
- `slug`: URL slug (defaults to slugified title)
- `description`: Post description/excerpt
- `image`: Feature image URL (auto-set from embedded images or IMDB/album)
- `rating`: 1.0-5.0 rating (for reviews)
- `imdb_id`: IMDB ID (e.g., `tt1234567`) - auto-fetches movie poster
- `in_reply_to`: URL this post is replying to
- `hide_title`: Set to `true` to hide the title on the page
- `song_link`: URL to a song (for music posts)
- `photo_feature`: Set to `true` or a URL for photo feature display
- `album`: For album art, use nested `title` and `artist` fields
- `syndicate`: Set to `false` to skip posting to Mastodon/Bluesky (default: true)

## Asset handling

- Images embedded with `![alt](url)` or `<img src="url" />` are downloaded
- Videos from GitHub assets (`https://github.com/.../assets/...`) are downloaded
- All assets are optimized and stored locally
-->

---
title: TITLE
date: "DATE"
category: blog/subcategory
tags:
---
